purpose: The email announces the 7th International Workshop on Formal Methods for Autonomous Systems (FMAS 2025), scheduled to take place in Paris, France from November 17 to 19, 2025. It invites researchers to submit papers on formal verification techniques for autonomous systems, highlighting key challenges and encouraging collaboration. Important dates for submissions and notifications are provided, along with details on submission categories and topics of interest.
evidence_sentences: FMAS 2025 is a 2.5-day peer-reviewed international workshop that brings together researchers working on a range of techniques for the formal verification of autonomous systems.
FMAS welcomes submissions that use formal methods to specify, model, or verify autonomous systems; in whole or in part.
Topics of interest include (but are not limited to): Applicable, tool-supported Formal Methods that are suited to Autonomous Systems.
